DOC.brief_summary: This study ass pharmacodynamics , safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics two different formulation indacaterol maleate , administer via Concept1 device . The study aim determine whether novel formulation similar clinical profile establish formulation .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effects Indacaterol Maleate New Formulation Concept 1 Device
DOC.criteria: Male female patient asthma Aged 18 Patients use inhale corticosteroid ( without long act beta agonist ) Patients demonstrate increase FEV1 inhale short act beta agonist Asthma exacerbations previous 6 month COPD pulmonary disease Excessive use short act beta agonist
